document_data.name: Zerillo
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Zerillo''''' was an inhabitant of the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I'm going to grow up to be a great wizard and wade through my enemies with spells of fire and blood! Mostly fire.|Zerillo}}
document_data.Description: Zerillo was a [[human]] boy with a light skin tone, dark brown hair, and dark brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] menaced the city of Baldur's Gate, Zerillo attended a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the [[Murl's Rest]] plaza in front of [[Sorcerous Sundries]]. The boy was in awe and wanted to grow up to be a [[wizard]].
